Referential.SQLJoin: inner join dbo.ACTOR algo on (algo.IDA = tblmain.IDA) and (algo.ALGOTYPE is null)

SQLPreSelect.Command: if exists ( select 1 from sysobjects where name='ACTOR_IDROLE_%%SHORTSESSIONID%%.ToUpper()_W' and xtype='V' ) drop view ACTOR_IDROLE_%%SHORTSESSIONID%%.ToUpper()_W;

create view ACTOR_IDROLE_%%SHORTSESSIONID%%.ToUpper()_W with schemabinding as select a.IDA,stuff( (select distinct ';' + rtrim(ar.IDROLEACTOR) from dbo.ACTOR a1 inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on (ar.IDA=a.IDA) where a1.IDA= a.IDA for XML PATH ('') ),1,1,'') as ROLE from dbo.ACTOR a where a.IDA = case when -1=%%DA:PK.GetDataSQLValue()%% then a.IDA else %%DA:PK.GetDataSQLValue()%% end group by a.IDA;

SQLWhere.SQLJoin: left outer join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT sr on sr.ID=tblmain.IDA and sr.CLASS='ACTOR' and sr.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
SQLWhere.SQLWhere: ( (sr.ID is not null) or ( (not exists(select 1 from dbo.ACTORMODEL where IDA=tblmain.IDA)) and ((tblmain.IDAINS=%%ID_USER%% And tblmain.IDAUPD is null) Or tblmain.IDAUPD=%%ID_USER%%) ) )

SQLWhere.SQLJoin: inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'ENTITY'))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'BROKER'))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and ((ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'BROKER') or (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'ENTITY')))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'COUNTERPARTY'))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'CSS'))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and ((ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'CSS') or (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'CLEARER')))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and ((ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'ENTITY') or (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'MARGINREQOFFICE')))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'ACCOUNTSERVICER'))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'INVOICINGOFFICE'))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'ISSUER'))
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ((ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and ((ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'CSS') or (ar.IDROLEACTOR = 'CUSTODIAN')))

Referential.SQLJoin: left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='ENTITY' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arENTITY on arENTITY.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='DESK' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arDESK on arDESK.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='DEPARTMENT' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arDEPT on arDEPT.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='CLIENT' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arCLIENT on arCLIENT.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='CORRESPONDENT' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arCORR on arCORR.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='BROKER' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arBROKER on arBROKER.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='CSS' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arCSS on arCSS.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR in ('CLEARER','CCLEARINGCOMPART','HCLEARINGCOMPART','MCLEARINGCOMPART') and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arCLR on arCLR.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='CUSTODIAN' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arCUS on arCUS.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='TRADER' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arTRADER on arTRADER.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='SALES' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arSALE on arSALE.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR='SYSADMIN' and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arSYSADMIN on arSYSADMIN.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and ACTORROLE.IDROLEACTOR in ('USER','GUEST','SYSADMIN','SYSOPER') and ((ACTORROLE.DTENABLED <= getdate()) and ((ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED is null) or (ACTORROLE.DTDISABLED > getdate()))))) arUSER on arUSER.IDA=tblmain.IDA
Referential.SQLRowStyle: case tblmain.IDA when arENTITY.IDA then 'ROLE_1_ENTITY' when arCLIENT.IDA then 'ROLE_4_CLIENT' when arDESK.IDA then 'ROLE_2_DESK' when arDEPT.IDA then 'ROLE_3_DEPT' when arCSS.IDA then 'ROLE_7_CSS' when arCLR.IDA then 'ROLE_5_CLEARER' when arCUS.IDA then 'ROLE_7_CUSTODIAN' when arBROKER.IDA then 'ROLE_6_BROKER' when arCORR.IDA then 'ROLE_8_CORRESPONDENT' when arTRADER.IDA then 'ROLE_9_TRADER' when arSALE.IDA then 'ROLE_A_SALE' when arSYSADMIN.IDA then 'ROLE_B_SYSADMIN' when arUSER.IDA then 'ROLE_C_USER' else 'ROLE_Z_OTHER' end
Referential.SQLRowState: case tblmain.IDA when arENTITY.IDA then 'lstaw=name:entity;title:Entity' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arDESK.IDA then 'lstaw=name:desk;title:Desk' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arDEPT.IDA then 'lstaw=name:dept;title:Department' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCLIENT.IDA then 'lstaw=name:client;title:Client' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCSS.IDA then 'lstaw=name:css;title:Clearing or Settlement system' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCLR.IDA then 'lstaw=name:clearer;title:Clearer (or Clearing compartment)' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCUS.IDA then 'lstaw=name:custodian;title:Custodian' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arBROKER.IDA then 'lstaw=name:broker;title:Broker' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCORR.IDA then 'lstaw=name:correspondant;title:Correspondent' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arTRADER.IDA then 'lstaw=name:trader;title:Trader' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arSALE.IDA then 'lstaw=name:sale;title:Sale' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arSYSADMIN.IDA then 'lstaw=name:admin;title:Administrator system' else case tblmain.IDA when arUSER.IDA then 'lstaw=name:user;title:User' else '' end end
